APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_NOT_ASSOCIATED_WIT: is not associated with any application.
APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_NO_TEMPLATE_FOUND: No application template called {{name}} was found with the qualifier {{qualifier}}
APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_DELETE_NO_DELETE: Template {{name}} with qualifier {{qualifier}} still has associated applications. It cannot be deleted.
APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_DELETE_DELETE: Template {{name}} with qualifier {{qualifier}} is not associated with any application. You can delete it if you want.
APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_DELETE_CONFIRM: Confirm the Deletion of this Application Template
APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_ONE_OR_SEVERAL_ASS: One or several applications are associated with this template.

APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_LIST_NO_DEPLOYED_A: No application template has been deployed so far.

APPLICATIONS_TEMPLATE_UPLOAD_DIRECTIVE_S: Select a ZIP file containing the application template to deploy.
INSTANCES_NO_FOUND_APPLICATION: No application called {{ name }} was found.
INSTANCES_NO_INSTANCE_CREATED: No instance has been created so far.
INSTANCES_ROOT_INSTANCE_NO_CHILD: This root instance has no child.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_ACTIONS: The following actions can be undertaken.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_ROOT_: The instance is not deployed. It can only be deployed.
You can also deploy and start this instance with all its children in one click.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_CYCLE: The life cycle of this instance is handled by Roboconf's {{installer}} installer.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_DEPLO: The instance is started. It can be only stopped.
The instance is stopped. It can be either started or undeployed.
The instance is being deployed by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_PARENT_INSTANCE_NO_DE: Its parent instance is not deployed.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_NOT_D: The instance is not deployed. You must deploy and start its parent before updating its state.
The instance is not deployed. It can only be deployed.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_ROOT_: The instance is deployed. It can only be undeployed.
The instance is being deployed by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_APP_ROOT_PROBLEM_2: It means Roboconf's Deployment Manager has not received a heartbeat from the associated agent for more than 2 minutes. This can be explained by a network issue on the Deployment Manager's side, a network on the agent's side, a network issue with the messaging server, or an error with messaging server itself (make sure it is still running).
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_ROOT_: The instance is being deployed by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_START: The instance is being started by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_STOPP: The instance is being stopped by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_UNDEP: The instance is being undeployed by Roboconf's {{installer}}.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_UNRES: The instance is waiting for its dependencies to be resolved before starting.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_DESCRIPTION_APP_WAITI: The instance is waiting for one of its ancestor to resolve its dependencies. This instance will start automatically with its ancestors.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_NO_EXPORTED_VARIABLE: This instance does not export any variable.
INSTANCES_INCLUDES_EXPORTED_VARIABLES: This instance exports the following variables.
INSTANCES_DELETE: Do you really want to delete this instance and its children?
INSTANCES_NEW_INFORMATION_MESSAGE: This page allows you to create a new instance for the {{appName}} application.
INSTANCES_NO_INSTANCE_CREATED: No instance has been created so far.
INSTANCES_INSTANCE_NAME_UNIQUE: The instance name must be unique among its siblings.
INSTANCES_NEW_ACTION_DELETE: This action will delete {{editedInstName}} and all its children.
INSTANCES_SELECT_AN_EXISTING_INSTANCE_BE: select an existing instance in the list below
INSTANCES_NEW_RESET_FORM_MESSAGE: You are about to reset everything. All the new instances will be dropped.
APPLICATIONS_BINDINGS_HAS_BINDINGS_NO_IM: This application does not import any external variable.
There is no binding to define between this application and others.
APPLICATIONS_BINDINGS_HAS_BINDINGS_PREFI: The following prefixes match properties exported by other applications.

APPLICATIONS_TARGETS_ASSOCIATE: This page allows to associate machine instances with deployment targets.
